name: Fire Keeper (codydoerr)
description:
Thank you for trying my game! 

Use WASD to move your dragon around the valley!

Press E while near a Cottage to increase it's warmth!

Press E while in the Lava Pit to charge up your Warming Breath!

Press Escape to exit the game at any time.

Make sure to keep all of your Cottages warm, or your villagers will freeze!
